compliant.section: To the extent provided for by local law and subject to applicable exceptions, individuals may have the following privacy rights in relation to their Personal Information: The right to know information about our processing of your Personal Information, including the specific pieces of Personal Information that we have collected from you; The right to request deletion of your Personal Information; The right to correct your Personal Information; and The right to be free from discrimination relating to the exercise of any of your privacy rights.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure, Prohibition of profiling for automated decision-making

compliant.section: We don’t “sell” Personal Information or “share” Personal Information for cross-contextual behavioral advertising (as those terms are defined under applicable local law)
compliant.legal provisions: Lawful basis for processing, Right to object to processing

compliant.section: We also don’t process sensitive Personal Information for the purposes of inferring characteristics about a consumer
compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data, Processing of personal data relating to criminal convictions and offences

compliant.section: Exercising your rights . To the extent applicable under local law, you can exercise privacy rights described in this section by submitting a request through privacy . openai . com (opens in a new window) or to dsar@openai . com .
compliant.legal provisions: Right to access, Right to rectification, Right to erasure, Right to object to processing

compliant.section: Verification . In order to protect your Personal Information from unauthorized access, change, or deletion, we may require you to verify your credentials before you can submit a request to know, correct, or delete Personal Information .
compliant.legal provisions: Right to access, Security of processing

compliant.section: If you do not have an account with us, or if we suspect fraudulent or malicious activity, we may ask you to provide additional Personal Information and proof of residency for verification . If we cannot verify your identity, we will not be able to honor your request .
compliant.legal provisions: Right to access, Security of processing

compliant.section: Authorized agents . You may also submit a rights request through an authorized agent . If you do so, the agent must present signed written permission to act on your behalf and you may also be required to independently verify your identity and submit proof of your residency with us . Authorized agent requests can be submitted to dsar@openai .
compliant.legal provisions: Right to access, Security of processing

non_compliant.section: Commercial Information, such as your transaction history We may disclose this information to our affiliates, vendors and service providers to process in accordance with our instructions; to law enforcement and other third parties for the legal reasons described above; to parties involved in Transactions; and to corporate administrators of enterprise or team accounts .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawful basis for processing, Right to information, Data portability
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the legal basis for processing commercial information, including the legitimate interests pursued. It should also provide clear information about the recipients of the data and the possibility of data portability.

non_compliant.section: Network Activity Information, such as Content and how you interact with our Services We may disclose this information to our affiliates, vendors and service providers to process in accordance with our instructions; to law enforcement and other third parties for the legal reasons described above; to parties involved in Transactions; and to other users and third parties you choose to share it with .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawful basis for processing, Right to information, Data portability
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the legal basis for processing network activity information, including the legitimate interests pursued. It should also provide clear information about the recipients of the data and the possibility of data portability.

non_compliant.section: Geolocation Data We may disclose this information to our affiliates, vendors and service providers to process in accordance with our instructions; to law enforcement and other third parties for the legal reasons described above; and to parties involved in Transactions .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawful basis for processing, Right to information, Data portability
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the legal basis for processing geolocation data, including the legitimate interests pursued. It should also provide clear information about the recipients of the data and the possibility of data portability.

non_compliant.section: Your account login credentials and payment card information (Sensitive Personal Information) We disclose this information to our affiliates, vendors and service providers, law enforcement, and parties involved in Transactions .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawful basis for processing, Processing of special categories of personal data, Processing of personal data relating to criminal convictions and offences, Right to information, Data portability
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the legal basis for processing sensitive personal information, including the legitimate interests pursued. It should also provide clear information about the recipients of the data and the possibility of data portability. The policy should also clearly state the specific purpose for processing sensitive personal information and ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place.
